PHYSIOLOGY.Definition: the study of the way in which the bodies of living things work

GOLDEN ERA.Definition: the best time (to be doing something)

KOMODO DRAGON.Definition: a very large lizard that lives in Indonesia

CLASSIFIED.Definition: given a name and put into a particular group

UNPACK.Definition: to understand an idea by considering all of its parts

BENEFIT OF THE DOUBT.Definition: if you give something the benefit of the doubt, you accept it until you see a reason not to

IN SHORT.Definition: used when you want to express the main point of an argument

AMATEURS.Definition: people who take part in an activity out of pleasure, not professionally

SWANS.Definition: large white birds with long necks

CANOE.Definition: a small, narrow boat, pointed at both ends

OUT OF THE CORNER OF YOUR EYE.Definition: if you see something out of the corner of your eye, you notice it accidentally without seeing it properly

POPPING OUT.Definition: if something pops out, only a small part of it is visible

JUMP TO THE CONCLUSION.Definition: believe something before knowing all the facts

EMBELLISHED.Definition: if a story is embellished, details are added that aren't true

MYTHICAL.Definition: not real, existing only in stories

CRYPTOZOOLOGISTS.Definition: people who are interested in cryptozoology

OBEY.Definition: behave according to a rule or law

REMAINS.Definition: the body of someone or something who has died

GEOLOGICAL.Definition: relating to geology, the study of the rocks and soil that make up the Earth

AMPHIBIAN.Definition: an animal that lives both on land and in water

EXTINCTION.Definition: the state of no longer existing

BUDDING.Definition: keen, beginning to show signs of interest in a subject
